#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<memory.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cassert>
#include<memory.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<utility>
using namespace std;
#define NN 505
typedef long long ll;

int N, c;

inline ll min(ll a, ll b){return a<b?a:b;}

void solve()
{
    ll sum = 0, m=1000000007;
    scanf("%d", &N);
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
       scanf("%d", &c);
       sum+=c;
       //cout<<"debug "<<sum<<" "<<sum/(i+1)<<endl;
       m= min(m,(sum/(i+1)));
    }
    printf("%lld\n",m);
}


int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
